name: Mazda Motor Europe
goal:
Mazda Motor Europe (MME) is the regional headquarters of the Japanese multinational car manufacturer Mazda for the European market. MME was established in 1989 and is located in Leverkusen, Germany.

MME develops strategies, concepts and processes, that successfully position Mazda in Europe and coordinates the operations of all National Sales Companies and Independent Distributors in more than 30 countries. An international team of over 200 employees are engaged in daily dialogue with Mazda entities around Europe and with Mazdaâ€™s parent company in Japan to ensure flawless operations.
interests: Climate Action, Digital economy and society, Environment, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives:

CO2 standards for cars
